    • Uses of Behaviour in game.behaviours

      Classes in game.behaviours that implement Behaviour 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AttackBehaviour
      A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
      class  ChantingBehaviour
      A class that generates a SummonZombieAction if the current Actor has a ZombieCapability.CHANT capability
      class  EatBehaviour
      A class that generates an EatAction if the current Actor is damaged and standing on a Food.
      class  FertilizeBehaviour
      A class that generates a FertilizeAction if the current Actor is standing on an unripe Crop to fertilize it.
      class  FollowBehaviour
      A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
      class  HarvestBehaviour
      A class that generates a HarvestAction if the current Actor is standing on or next to a ripe Crop.
      class  HuntBehaviour
      Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
      class  PickUpWeaponBehaviour
      A class that generates a PickUpItemAction if the current Actor is standing on a location that has a weapon.
      class  SowBehaviour
      A class that generates an SowAction if the current Actor is standing beside a Dirt to sow a crop on it.
      class  WanderBehaviour
      Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
